tests.title: 1.Shop-Filter By Price Functionality
tests.fullTitle: The Shop tests spec 1.Shop-Filter By Price Functionality

tests.title: 2.Shop-Product Categories Functionality
tests.fullTitle: The Shop tests spec 2.Shop-Product Categories Functionality
tests.code:
cy.xpath('//*[@id="content"]/form/select').select('price-desc'); // filter from high to low
cy.wait(2000); //wait for the URl to load
cy.get('.products').should('be.visible');
cy.xpath('//*[@id="content"]/ul/li[1]/a[1]/img').click(); // click on the first book 
cy.wait(2000); //wait for the URl to load
cy.xpath('//*[@id="product-160"]/div[2]/h1').should('include.text', 'Selenium Ruby'); // the book name shoul match

err.message:
CypressError: Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.click()` failed because the page updated while this command was executing. Cypress tried to locate elements based on this query:

> <a.wpmenucart-contents.empty-wpmenucart-visible.updating>

We initially found matching element(s), but while waiting for them to become actionable, they disappeared from the page. Common situations why this happens:
  - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously
  - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element

You can typically solve this by breaking up a chain. For example, rewrite:

> `cy.get('button').click().click()`

to

> `cy.get('button').as('btn').click()`
> `cy.get('@btn').click()`

https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
err.estack:
CypressError: Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.click()` failed because the page updated while this command was executing. Cypress tried to locate elements based on this query:

> <a.wpmenucart-contents.empty-wpmenucart-visible.updating>

We initially found matching element(s), but while waiting for them to become actionable, they disappeared from the page. Common situations why this happens:
  - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously
  - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element

You can typically solve this by breaking up a chain. For example, rewrite:

> `cy.get('button').click().click()`

to

> `cy.get('button').as('btn').click()`
> `cy.get('@btn').click()`
